revised_title: Evolutionary Ecology of Seed Dormancy and Seed Size: Plant Life Histories
tldr: This article explores the evolutionary and ecological factors influencing seed dormancy and seed size in plants. It examines the relationships between seed traits, plant life history, and environmental factors, and discusses the implications of these relationships for plant survival and coexistence. The study uses comparative analysis and phylogenetic information to understand the complex patterns of seed traits and their evolution.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Ecology and Evolution
